dcterms:creator: Masayasu Muraoka
Ryosuke Kohita
Etsuko Ishii
dcterms:description: A large dataset collected from Wikipedia articles, containing 66k articles and 320k images/caption pairs, providing various topics and structures for pretraining vision-language models.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used in a zero-shot setting for evaluating the most relevant sentence prediction, containing various educational materials.
dcterms:title: Open Textbook Dataset

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan
Piotr Dollár
C Lawrence Zitnick
dcterms:description: A dataset containing images of common objects in context, widely used for image captioning and object detection tasks.
dcterms:title: COCO (Common Objects in Context)

dcterms:creator: Ali Furkan Biten
Lluis Gomez
Marc¸al Rusi˜nol
Dimos-thenis Karatzas
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for context-driven entity-aware captioning for news images, focusing on the relationship between news articles and their corresponding images.
dcterms:title: Good News Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a large number of visual questions and answers based on images, focusing on knowledge-aware visual question answering.
dcterms:title: KVQA (Knowledge-aware Visual Question Answering)

dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on news image captioning, providing benchmarks and challenges for evaluating models in this domain.
dcterms:title: Visual News Dataset
